item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
Enable "albuminfo" to contain links and other markup.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
Use the "albuminfo" to set the title and description of each gallery.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by TWW :
Added a gallery/index page that lists the multiple galleries. Enabled albums to contain metadata. Automated the image variant (e.g. thumb, small) creation. Note that this is not backward-compatible, so existing users need to move original images from the old "big" directory and remove the "preview" and "small" directories.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Use locationmap for resolution of resources and files. Resources are exposed via {lm:photoGallery.*}

item.title: docs fix (bug FOR-519)
item.description:
docs fix by RDG (fixes bug FOR-519)
:
Use "alt" motd position to prevent the motd overlaying the image. Thanks to kevin.

item.title: admin update
item.description:
admin update by RDG :
Renamed to bring into line with naming conventions.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Added link back to index page and provide some text for links to next image and larger/smaller image.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by RDG :
Changed method of identifying pictures, it no longer users request parameters, therefore it will work in a statically generated site as well as in a webapp.

item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by RDG :
Added some sample pictures.

item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by RDG :
Added basic documentation.

item.title: admin add (bug FOR-387)
item.description:
admin add by RDG (fixes bug FOR-387)
:
Initial plugin code. Thanks to Jorg Werner.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
Enable "albuminfo" to contain links and other markup.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by DC :
Use the "albuminfo" to set the title and description of each gallery.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by TWW :
Added a gallery/index page that lists the multiple galleries. Enabled albums to contain metadata. Automated the image variant (e.g. thumb, small) creation. Note that this is not backward-compatible, so existing users need to move original images from the old "big" directory and remove the "preview" and "small" directories.
